title.value: England Identifier General Medical Council Reference Number

description.value:
NHS Data Dictionary: [GENERAL MEDICAL COUNCIL REFERENCE NUMBER](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/attributes/general_medical_council_reference_number.html) which is a [CONSULTANT CODE](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/consultant_code.html)
Format: ^[C]{1}[0-9]{7}$ (CNNNNNNN)
FHIR Naming System [gmc-number](https://simplifier.net/ukfhircommunityassets/namingsystem-gmc-number)

purpose.value: This documents NHS England Data Dictionary and HL7 definitions
